text: avarkalitam accamutti eccarippavar evarum varuvarayin niccayamakat tankal marrenta oru camutayattaiyum vita mika neranapataiyil cenru kontiruppataka avarkal allahvin mitu palamana piramanankalaik kontu cattiyam ceytarkal; ayinum avarkalitam accamutti eccarippavar enta potu, (atu) avarkalukku veruppait tavira (veretaiyum) atikappatutta villai
